paper_abstract: We study the possibility of preventing finite-time disentanglement caused by dissipation by making use of non-local quantum error correction. This is made in comparison to previous results, where it was shown that local quantum error correction can delay disentanglement, but can also cause entanglement sudden death when it is not originally present.
paper_title: COMBATING ENTANGLEMENT SUDDEN DEATH WITH NON-LOCAL QUANTUM-ERROR CORRECTION
